name: Dronny and Christmas gifts
description:
Help Dronny to deliver a few last Christmas gifts to get his own present! 

You can also play directly in browser by the link: Dronny - play.unity.com

This is a demo of my future multiplayer online game which I'm currently working on. I want to test this idea with you. How do you like it? Imagine a lot of drones (players) at one scene delivering different parcels to citizens. Stay up to date if you would like to play such game. Going to launch it on February 2022. See you!)
